attributes.action: To BAN to the British Television Licence Fee, and insist that the BBC uses advertising to raise it's funds, the same way as other networks do.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ALL know how hard it is to cope finacially at the moment, and how we are ALL being told to save more of our hard earned money?
Well a BAN on the TV licence would make it easier for us all to save a little more easily.
So please give me your support to try and give us all a little bit of our finacial freedom back.
Many thanks in advance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
